title: Man arrested over AI-generated porn images of actress
description: Police have arrested a man in Akita, a city in Japan's northeast, for allegedly sharing pornographic images online that were made to resemble an actress using generative artificial intelligence. The charge against Hiroya Yokoi is related to three such images shared between January and June, but the 31-year-old is believed…

title: South Korea kicks off arms fair to showcase unmanned, AI weapons
description: South Korea kicked off its largest-ever arms fair on Friday, with firms expected to show off new unmanned and artificial intelligence-enhanced weapons from howitzers to suicide drones, as Seoul seeks to strengthen its military and pursues more global defence sales.

title: South Korea kicks off arms fair to showcase unmanned, AI weapons
description: South Korea kicked off its largest-ever arms fair on Friday, with firms expected to show off new unmanned and artificial intelligence-enhanced weapons from howitzers to suicide drones, as Seoul seeks to strengthen its military and pursues more global defence sales. Organisers said a record 600 companies from 35 countries were scheduled to participate in the Seoul International Aerospace & Defense Exhibition (ADEX) 2025.
content: South Korea kicked off its largest-ever arms fair on Friday, with firms expected to show off new unmanned and artificial intelligence-enhanced weapons from howitzers to suicide drones, as Seoul seeks to strengthen its military and pursues more global... [2364 chars]

title: Spotify plans its own AI lab, promises to keep it responsible
description: Spotify has partnered with major record labels to develop new artificial intelligence music products aimed at protecting artists’ rights and ensuring fair compensation. The initiative places a strong emphasis on copyright, artist consent, and transparency, while responding to recent concerns over generative AI in the music industry.
content: Spotify has announced a major partnership with leading record labels Sony, Universal, Warner, and Merlin to develop new artificial intelligence music products. As debate intensifies around AI’s role in music creation and the need for fair artist comp... [3694 chars]

title: NDTV World Summit 2025: AI Will Create More Jobs Than It Will Displace, Says Nitin Mittal
description: Artificial intelligence will create more jobs than it displaces as industries invest in AI infrastructure and skills, said Nitin Mittal, global AI leader and author of All In on AI, at the NDTV World Summit on Friday.
content:
Artificial intelligence will create more jobs than it displaces as industries invest in AI infrastructure and skills, said Nitin Mittal, global AI leader and author of All In on AI, at the NDTV World Summit on Friday.

title: Why your SME belongs at the ET AI Awards 2025
description: The ET AI Awards 2025 is redefining the future of business innovation by celebrating small and medium enterprises (SMEs) that are using artificial intelligence to create measurable impact. From financial services to agriculture, these awards recognise the trailblazers turning AI into a competitive edge.

title: Salesforce tries to help ICE boost its immigration force
description: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff's support for President Trump has extended to pitching artificial intelligence capabilities to ICE for staffing up immigration enforcement. Internal documents reveal Salesforce's efforts to secure contracts for talent acquisition and AI-driven investigations, drawing criticism from San Francisco leaders who view it as a betrayal of city values.
